itemLabel: Peter Archer, Baron Archer of Sandwell

wikipedia_page.main: Peter Kingsley Archer, Baron Archer of Sandwell,  (20 November 1926 – 14 June 2012), was a British lawyer and Labour Party politician. He was a Member of Parliament from 1966 until 1992, when he became a life peer. Between 1974 and 1979 he was Solicitor General for England and Wales.

response: *2012 – Peter Archer, Baron Archer of Sandwell, English lawyer and politician, Solicitor General for England and Wales (b. 1926)
